channel.title: Corda on Raja Kesari
channel.description: Recent content in Corda on Raja Kesari

item.title: Certified CORDA Developer!
item.description: When I first came across R3 Corda, as part of my blockchain learning, the first fact that hit me hard is that it is not actually a true blockchain. Yet, it achieves what the blockchain technology truly wants to achieve especially the enterprise blockchains.
